group_1.textLeft: How can Sis have such a calm look right now?

group_1.textRight: Huh?
Fumu...Fumufumunmu!

group_1.textLeft: We didn't do anything wrong.
But just because we're from Daito...
How can you look so calm while you're getting@badmouthed like that?

group_1.textCenter: *Chuckle* Then I guess I'll teach you two a special@lesson.
That is, because I'm an adult...

group_1.textLeft: A-an adult's composure...!
Yeah, maybe! You seemed super mature just now,@Sis!

group_1.textRight: Fumufumu!

group_1.textCenter: Being an adult means knowing how to stay relaxed.
If you can stay relaxed like that, you tend not to get@angry right away.

group_1.textLeft: So, that's it then...

group_1.textRight: Fumun?

group_1.textCenter: (But we were just thinking about appearances.)
(But that's not what being mature is about.)
(Maturity is about how you think and feel...!)

group_1.textLeft: Sis!@Mii is going to grow up!
Mii's going to have an adult's composure, and@make sure not to get mad right away!

group_1.textRight: Fu, fumufumumun!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, Sutan is also going to do her best with me!

group_1.textRight: *Chuckle* You have my support.
But, remember one thing:
Keeping an adult's composure...
...isn't just about pushing your feelings down, okay?

group_1.textLeft: ...Is that true?

group_1.textRight: It is. You can't just smile in the face of everything.
Sometimes you have to get angry...
Sometimes you have to state your opinions loud@and clear...
Being an adult is about recognizing the right time@to do those things...
Well, that's what I think.

group_1.textLeft: But earlier you didn't argue with the old man.

group_1.textRight: That neighborhood watch man could certainly have@chosen his words a lot better...
...but it did seem like he really was concerned for@you two.
At times like that, it's not very productive to get in@a fight over it, right?
Arguing would just put both of you in an even@worse mood.

group_1.textLeft: I knew it, Sis is so amazing!@So mature!
Mii is gonna use Sis as a role model...
...and then you'll see me grow up super fast!

group_1.textRight: My oh my...
As your Sis, I want you to always be a cute@little sister.
Why do you want to grow up so quickly?

group_1.textLeft: (Mii wants to grow up quickly and help Sis.)
(Even all the problems in Kamihama that've hurt@Sis...)
(Mii's gonna solve all of 'em. Every last one.)
(But, this is...)
Sis can't know, it's still a secret!

group_1.textRight: Huhhh~...?!
